title: Client Authenticating Forever
body: For a month now my client will go through periods from 10 minutes to sometimes hours where when I try to log in it stays on the Authenticating stage forever. I will also once inside the client (if that happens) randomly disconnect from the client and have to roll the dice again to see if I can log in. Every other application and website loads and works very quickly so this is clearly an isolated issue with the client. I have tried the Hextech Repair tool, reupdating, and reinstalling and this is still happening DAILY.

replies.body: If you're having such a hard time getting a solid connection to our authentication servers there's likely something getting in the way and blocking your connection from being able to reach our login servers. Check out this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) making sure to update your port forwarding and DNS settings, but let's also make sure that there aren't any firewalls or antivirus programs blocking your network too.
I already downloaded the support tool and used it for this.
